snippet: In recent months the Police Department has placed several senior officials on modified assignments, stripping them of their badges and guns.
abstract: New York Police Department announces that one official has been reassigned and one detective has been fired amid federal investigation into two businessmen who tried to wield influence with police officials and others in Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration.

byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

lead_paragraph: In recent months the Police Department has placed several senior officials on modified assignments, stripping them of their badges and guns.

headline.main: Amid Inquiry, a New York City Police Official Is Fired, Another Is Reassigned
headline.print_headline: Detective Fired Amid Inquiry  Into the Police
